flavorText: "By ancient magics, by angels' grace, we will survive this night."

foreignData.flavorText: „Durch uralte Magie und durch die Gnade der Engel werden wir diese Nacht überleben."
foreignData.name: Ritualwächterin
foreignData.text: Hexenzirkel — Zu Beginn des Kampfes in deinem Zug und falls du drei oder mehr Kreaturen mit unterschiedlicher Stärke kontrollierst, erhält die Ritualwächterin Lebensverknüpfung bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignData.flavorText: "Por la magia antigua y por la gracia de los ángeles: sobreviviremos a esta noche".
foreignData.name: Guardiana del ritual
foreignData.text: Aquelarre — Al comienzo del combate en tu turno, si controlas tres o más criaturas con fuerzas distintas, la Guardiana del ritual gana la habilidad de vínculo vital hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: « Par les magies ancestrales, par la grâce des anges, nous survivrons à cette nuit. »
foreignData.name: Vigile du rituel
foreignData.text: Congrégation — Au début du combat pendant votre tour, si vous contrôlez au moins trois créatures avec des forces différentes, le Vigile du rituel acquiert le lien de vie jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.flavorText: "Per l'antica magia, per la grazia degli angeli, questa notte sopravvivremo."
foreignData.name: Guardiana del Rituale
foreignData.text: Congrega — All'inizio del combattimento nel tuo turno, se controlli tre o più creature con forza diversa, la Guardiana del Rituale ha legame vitale fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 「古の魔法と天使の恩寵によって、我らは夜を生き延びよう。」
foreignData.name: 儀式の守護者
foreignData.text: 集会 — あなたのターンの戦闘の開始時に、あなたがパワーが異なる３体以上のクリーチャーをコントロールしている場合、ターン終了時まで、儀式の守護者は絆魂を得る。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・兵士

foreignData.flavorText: "고대의 마법과 천사의 은총으로, 우리는 이 밤을 견뎌낼 것이다."
foreignData.name: 의식 수호자
foreignData.text: 집회 — 당신의 턴 전투 시작에, 당신이 서로 공격력이 다른 생물을 세 개 이상 조종한다면, 의식 수호자는 턴종료까지 생명연결을 얻는다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Pela magia antiga, pela graça dos anjos, sobreviveremos a esta noite."
foreignData.name: Guardiã do Ritual
foreignData.text: Conventículo — No início do combate no seu turno, se você controlar três ou mais criaturas com poderes diferentes, Guardiã do Ritual ganha vínculo com a vida até o final do turno.

foreignData.flavorText: «Могущество древней магии и милость ангелов поможет нам пережить эту ночь».
foreignData.name: Стражница Ритуала
foreignData.text: Шабаш — В начале боя во время вашего хода, если вы контролируете не менее трех существ с различными значениями силы, Стражница Ритуала получает Цепь жизни до конца хода.

foreignData.flavorText: 「得远古魔法加护，承天使恩典保佑，我们定能挺过长夜。」
foreignData.name: 仪式守护者
foreignData.text: 鸠集～在你回合的战斗开始时，若你操控三个或更多力量各不相同的生物，则仪式守护者获得系命异能直到回合结束。

foreignData.flavorText: 「得遠古魔法加護，承天使恩典保佑，我們定能挺過長夜。」
foreignData.name: 儀式守護者
foreignData.text: 鳩集～在你回合的戰鬥開始時，若你操控三個或更多力量各不相同的生物，則儀式守護者獲得繫命異能直到回合結束。

name: Ritual Guardian
originalText: Coven — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more creatures with different powers, Ritual Guardian gains lifelink until end of turn.

rulings.text: A creature has different power from another if their powers are different numbers. For example, a 1/1 creature and a 2/1 creature have different powers.

For three creatures to have different powers from one another, each of their powers needs to be different. A 1/1 creature, a 2/1 creature, and another 2/1 creature aren't three creatures with different powers, even though both 2/1 creatures have different power than the 1/1 creature.

Many coven abilities, such as that of Dawnhart Wardens above, are triggered abilities with intervening if clauses. You must control three or more creatures with different powers at the time the ability triggers and at the time the ability tries to resolve. They do not, however, need to be the same set of creatures in both cases.

text: Coven — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more creatures with different powers, Ritual Guardian gains lifelink until end of turn.
